Actions.Name: Soul Slash
Actions.Effect: All foes adjacent to the target take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Death March
Actions.Description: The Wight and all adjacent allies may move 1 space in the same direction, ignoring engagement, then each may deal [fray] damage to an adjacent foe.

Actions.Name: Formation
Actions.Description: Shove all allies in range 2 1 space towards this character.
